OVRDC Web Apps

A site dedicated to app templates and examples for web data visualization.

App Templates

All templates can be run as client-side applications. API keys/cloud accounts are used where appropriate.

Open Parcel Viewer

A client-side parcel viewer built with Leaflet capable of rendering a up to 50k polygons in the browser with search and identify. Built with Leaflet 0.7.

leaflet jekyll

GPS Collection App

A simple web app that sends user input, including lat/lng, to a Google Form, then displays that content on a Leaflet map.

leaflet google

Basic Leaflet Map
